ComicInfo.Title: Journey's End
ComicInfo.Summary:
Truths will be revealed as Skye comes face-to-face with her most powerful enemy! Does the Guardian of the Nexus stand a chance or will she fall under the power of Merlin and the Knights of the Roundtable? Find out here in the penultimate issue to the Odyssey story arc!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Caanan White & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | | C | Cover C | Hedwin Zaldivar | 3 | | D | Cover D | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 4 | | E | Fairy Tale Collectible Variant Cover 4 of 12, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | | F | WonderCon Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | | G | Classic Fairy Tale Collectible Variant Cover 4 of 5, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | | H | Classic Fairy Tale Collectible Variant Cover 4 of 5, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | | I | Classic Fairy Tale Collectible Variant Cover 4 of 5, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | | J | VIP ComicFest Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | | K | Subscription Plus Level Foil Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Paul Green | Missing | | L | Motor City Comic Con Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
Note: The digital edition (4/8/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
